valueSet.valueSetDefinition: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

A.definition: Marriage contract has been declared null and to not have existed

D.definition: Marriage contract has been declared dissolved and inactive

M.definition: A current marriage contract is active

S.definition: No marriage contract has ever been entered

T.definition: Person declares that a domestic partner relationship exists.

U.definition: Currently not in a marriage contract.

UNK.definition: A proper value is applicable, but not known
